5304.quoteText:
We may provide your information to third parties when we believe that doing so is required by law or to cooperate with regulators or law enforcement authorities.
We may disclose your information in order to protect the rights or property of Nexon, including enforcing our Terms of Service and End User License Agreement, and others, or when we believe that there is an emergency that poses a threat to the health or safety of you, another person, or the public.
